neighbors.name: John & Shelley Barnes
neighbors.claims: Cochise County tax lien records list the owner of parcel 106-48-003 as 'Bridget A', not John and Shelley Barnes ([parcelinquirytreasurer.cochise.az.gov](https://parcelinquirytreasurer.cochise.az.gov/Main/TaxLienList)). A Shelley Barnes is a resident of Sierra Vista who has reviewed local electrical services ([leadsmartinc.com](https://leadsmartinc.com/services/electrical-services/electrician/arizona/sierra-vista/antelope-run-electric/)). A John Barnes has served as a contact for the Tucson Amateur Astronomy Association's Chiricahua Astronomy Complex in Cochise County ([tucsonastronomy.org](http://tucsonastronomy.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/TAAA_Newsletter_201103.pdf)). No references in local meetings or news indicate that individuals by these names have taken a public position on development or energy projects ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=384#:~:text=subscriptions%2C%20save%20form%20progress%20and,COCHISE%20COUNTY%20BOARD)).
neighbors.influence_justification: No public roles or visibility found for a couple by this name

approach_recommendations.engage: Due to the discrepancy in property records (parcel owned by 'Bridget A'), verify the correct landowner identity before outreach. If John and Shelley Barnes are the correct contacts, approach informally to clarify their connection to the property.

neighbors.verification_notes: The provided PIN (106-48-003) is registered to 'Bridget A' in Cochise County tax records. No joint public record for 'John & Shelley Barnes' was found in the county. Individual matches for 'John Barnes' and 'Shelley Barnes' exist but are not linked.
